data.name: Magi Runners
data.flavorText: It is said that a Magi once ran to the sun with these shoes on. You're not sure if you could, but they sure are fast.

data.name: Warlock's Slippers
data.flavorText: Many people don't trust Warlocks, so they don't get out much. These keep their feet cozy at home.

data.name: Crimson Boots
data.flavorText: These will certainly make a bold statement at your next wizarding get together.

data.name: Glacial Boots
data.flavorText: Extremely warm, these will keep your feet toasty in the Mountains, but elsewhere they might make them sweaty.

data.name: Dragon Soles
data.flavorText: Are these dragonskin boots? Comfortable, but they smell a bit like burnt meat and old cave.

data.name: Hot Walkers
data.flavorText: Fitted with a handy self-drying flame, you can swim with these on and not have to worry.

data.name: Training Shoes
data.flavorText: Nothing special, but they'll protect your feet during training.

data.name: Light Shoes
data.flavorText: Lightweight and breathable they'll make your feet move faster and maybe a little less smelly.

data.name: Cloth Shoes
data.flavorText: Made from cloth, don't get them wet or your feet will be cold all day!

data.name: Heavy Shoes
data.flavorText: Whoa, these are heavy! Your feet feel pretty safe, but it also feels like you're walking through mud.

data.name: Leather Boots
data.flavorText: The choice of the everyday wizard. They say they're hand-crafted in the Spire.

data.name: Durofibre Boots
data.flavorText: Sleek, stylish and purple...

data.name: Magi-thread Boots
data.flavorText: You don't usually go for used boots, but the Magi made these long-lasting and really cool-looking.

data.name: Pyrium Boots
data.flavorText: You can wear these boots all year long, just make sure to change your wizard socks!

data.name: Mithril Boots
data.flavorText: Metal boots? You might not move that quickly, but your toes are totally protected!

data.name: Vitrium Boots
data.flavorText: When you wear them you move more gracefully but also always have the urge to dance.

data.name: Culix Boots
data.flavorText: Although Culix was a bit stuffy he had great taste in shoes.

data.name: Trialmaster's Boots
data.flavorText: Worn by a former master of trials, whose feet seemed to be quite small. They're a little snug.

data.name: Winter Boots
data.flavorText: Fuzzy on the inside and waterproof on the outside, the perfect choice for the long winter months.

data.name: Dragon Spike Boots
data.flavorText: Your friend wore these spiky boots to play wizard soccer once, they don't let him play anymore. I wonder why?

data.name: Warm Boots
data.flavorText: These sure do live up to their name.

data.name: Magic Boots
data.flavorText: You do feel suddenly more magical, but sometimes people laugh at the pointy toes.

data.name: Frost Saber Boots
data.flavorText: Made for battle in the cold, these shoes help you stay on top of the snow instead of sinking in.

data.name: Firefly Boots
data.flavorText: The trademark boots of the Firefly Forest. It says they're made with moss and lots of love.

data.name: Skywalkers
data.flavorText: A wizard once wanted to see how high he could jump with these shoes on. He's supposed to come back down any day now.

data.name: Duelist Boots
data.flavorText: Official boots of the Annual Wizard Dueling Contest, they say "The Choice of Champions" in big letters on their sides.

data.name: Shiverchill Boots
data.flavorText: Commonly worn by the tribes of the Shiverchill Mountains, many travellers take them when going to cold places.

data.name: Embers
data.flavorText: Made for wizards whose feet get cold. It feels like your toes are warming up in front of the fire.

data.name: Dire Pirate Boots
data.flavorText: Said to be suitable for dueling on rocky terrain.

data.name: Sea Sword Boots
data.flavorText: These boots cut through water, allowing wearers to walk as easily as if they were on land.

data.name: Bubble Boots
data.flavorText: These bubbly boots make you feel like you could float through the air.

data.name: Admiral's Boots
data.flavorText: These boots have been through many adventures on the high seas, but they're still sturdy!

data.name: Shell Armor Boots
data.flavorText: These boots are so tough, they make your toes smell like the ocean!

data.name: Magma Boots
data.flavorText: Keep your toes warm with these lava rockin' boots inspired by Magmischief himself.

data.name: Skates of Glory
data.flavorText: These skates are so much better than sneakers when you are out on the ice. So sit down, lace up, and go skate!

data.name: Fire Walkers
data.flavorText: CLUNK! CLUNK! CLUNK! Use these heavy boots to walk in the deepest lava.

data.name: 1x Conjure Cube
data.flavorText: A bundle of one conjure cube.

data.name: 5x Conjure Cube
data.flavorText: A bundle of five conjure cubes.

data.name: 20x Conjure Cube
data.flavorText: A bundle of twenty conjure cubes.

data.name: Candy Corn
data.flavorText: The primary currency of Pumpkinfest. Used to buy costumes and cool items in the town square during the event!

data.name: Relic Coin
data.flavorText: A rusty old coin. Used to buy rare artifacts from the wandering merchant.

data.name: Star Shards
data.flavorText: The primary currency of the Starlight Festival. These are used to buy costumes and cool items in the town square during the event!

data.name: Magic Snowflakes
data.flavorText: The primary currency of Winterfest. These are used to buy costumes and cool items in the town square during the event!

data.name: Wood
data.flavorText: This special wood was used by Floatlings to construct makeshift houses as they traveled around the island in search of knowledge.

data.name: Dragon Flies
data.flavorText: These captured Dragon Flies can be traded to Mama Star for special dragon-ish items.

data.name: Titan Shard
data.flavorText: Shards broken off of a Titan created by the Order of Influence. Can be given to a Floatling to have the Shadow magic removed from it, in exchange for rare items.

data.name: Comfy Chair
data.flavorText: Just a regular old chair. You can sit on it; that's all you need, right?

data.name: Steel Chair
data.flavorText: A sturdy steel chair. One questions the comfort of such a thing.

data.name: Wooden Nightstand
data.flavorText: Cleverly made from driftwood and old rope.

data.name: Steel Table
data.flavorText: A sturdy steel table. Much more practical than its chair counterpart.

data.name: Glass Table
data.flavorText: A standard glass table. Don't jump on it!

data.name: Pink Flowerpot
data.flavorText: This little pink flower is a common gift on Valentine's Day.

data.name: Bushy Plant
data.flavorText: A regular green potted plant. Gives off a distinct aroma.

data.name: Tall Fern
data.flavorText: This plant has grown to be a bit unkempt. Perfect for those who want a wild look for their room.

data.name: Forest Flower
data.flavorText: This large wildflower can only be found during spring in the Firefly Forest. Its perfume-like odor keeps bugs away.

data.name: Purple Couch
data.flavorText: Like a regular couch, but purple.

data.name: Green Couch
data.flavorText: Like a regular couch, but green.

data.name: Purple Chair
data.flavorText: This large, lazy chair is so comfy, that once you sit on it, you'll never want to stand up again.

data.name: Bookshelf
data.flavorText: A regular wooden bookshelf, perfect for storing all of your favorite spell books.

data.name: Wooden Table
data.flavorText: A standard wooden table. The most standard of all the tables.

data.name: Small Chair
data.flavorText: Tiny chairs made for tiny individuals.

data.name: Wardrobe
data.flavorText: This large wooden wardrobe has all the space you could need to store your wizarding outfits.

data.name: Starry Bed
data.flavorText: This sky themed bed is so fluffy, it's like lying on a cloud.

data.name: Square Window
data.flavorText: A square window, or is it 4 square windows?

data.name: Fancy Window
data.flavorText: The fanciest of windows. Not actually, but it is pretty fancy.

data.name: Dining Table
data.flavorText: This spacious table is perfect for large gatherings and parties.

data.name: Treasure Chest
data.flavorText: A stout sea chest to safely store all your treasures.

data.name: Frosty Bear
data.flavorText: This cuddly guy is perfect for those lonely days at home.

data.name: Bawk-bawk Clock
data.flavorText: Never be late again! The squawking sound this clock makes is so annoying, it is impossible to ignore.

data.name: Dragon Mirror
data.flavorText: A mirror that shows its user as a dragon. It was created by Small Hood Nagol, a wizard notorious for his obsession with dragons.

data.name: Frozen Mirror
data.flavorText: A mirror made of ice. There is a label on the back that says 'Warning keep frozen'.

data.name: Round Mirror
data.flavorText: This mirror is so perfectly rounded, it is impossible to tell the top from the bottom.

data.name: Frozen Throne
data.flavorText: This throne doesn't look too comfy, but gosh does it look cool.

data.name: Forest Wardrobe
data.flavorText: A wardrobe carved out of wood from the Big Tree. The vines on the side are grown around the closet for a unique look every time.

data.name: Purple Potted Plant
data.flavorText: This purple potted plant is picked in the plains and is perfect for perching atop any platform.

data.name: Red Potted Plant
data.flavorText: This red potted plant emanates a light pulsating glow. It is picked from the Fiery Forest surrounding Bonfire Spire.

data.name: Mushroom Lamp
data.flavorText: A special mushroom for the Firefly forest. When shocked with electricity, it gives off a warm glow from its spots.

data.name: Table Lamp
data.flavorText: A normal table lamp. You can put it on a chair if you're feeling crazy.

data.name: Flower Lamp
data.flavorText: Looks like a flower, smells like a flower, but isn't a flower. It's a lamp.

data.name: Aquarium
data.flavorText: Keep your favorite water pets happy with this personal aquarium.

data.name: Icy Table
data.flavorText: A table made of ice. Designed for the inhabitants of Shiverchill before the Ice Worm appeared.

data.name: Flame Banner
data.flavorText: A banner flown only by those who have mastered the art of fire spells.

data.name: Snow Banner
data.flavorText: A banner flown only by those who have mastered the art of ice spells.

data.name: Forest Banner
data.flavorText: A banner flown only by those who have mastered the art of earth spells.

data.name: Stuffed Dragon
data.flavorText: A plush dragon toy. It is surprisingly not particularly hug-able, as the skin is made from real dragon hide.

data.name: Fire Throne
data.flavorText: Keep your toosh warm with the ultimate in heated seats. A flaming throne!

data.name: Tall Lamp
data.flavorText: This lamp is so tall its a miracle if you can get it into your room.

data.name: Sunfire Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp that emanates a large amount of heat, as its light source is a heated iron core.

data.name: Ice Shard Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp that shines brilliantly in many colors, filtering light through its ice prisms.

data.name: Canopy Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp made from a firefly plant. These plants only grow in the Firefly forest and glow much like a giant firefly's tail.

data.name: Forest Throne
data.flavorText: A throne carved from a stump. It is still a living plant, so be sure to water it!

data.name: Phoenix Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp designed to look like a Phoenix.

data.name: Ice Phoenix Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp designed to look like a Phoenix, but icy for some reason.

data.name: Amber
data.flavorText: This piece of amber has an ancient bug pet preserved inside of it. It makes for quite the conversation piece.

data.name: Anchor Chair
data.flavorText: The perfect chair for a seafarer or, ironically, someone who cannot swim.

data.name: Dingy Bed
data.flavorText: This tiny bed is convenient to have for guests. It can compress for easy storage.

data.name: Boombox
data.flavorText: No party is complete with some great music to dance to. Get your groove on!

data.name: Ship in a Bottle
data.flavorText: A perfect scale model of a ship. One wonders how they got it into the bottle.

data.name: Carnoplant
data.flavorText: This carnivorous plant is useful for keeping bug infestations under control.

data.name: Rugged Bed
data.flavorText: For those who like to reminisce about the cave-man days. Enjoy the worst night of sleep in your life.

data.name: Dyno Skull
data.flavorText: A large decorative dyno skull. It is made from foam, for ease of transportation.

data.name: Floaty Bed
data.flavorText: This bed is filled with helium, making it float slightly off the ground. Its light rocking will put you to sleep instantly!

data.name: Stuffed Dyno
data.flavorText: This cute little stuffed Dyno used to be a common prize at the Dyno dig site.

data.name: Gramophone
data.flavorText: A boombox for the old school. Perfect for it you like your music to sound old.

data.name: Shipwheel
data.flavorText: The steering wheel from a sunken ship. The remnants of the ship have never been found.

data.name: Phaser Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp designed for those with interests in sci-fi.

data.name: Lifesaver
data.flavorText: A perfect edition to any home in a location that is prone to flooding, or if you just can't swim.

data.name: Excavation Table
data.flavorText: This table comes equipped with everything you could need to investigate a dig site.

data.name: Porthole
data.flavorText: Intended for peering out at the sea. One wonders about its purpose in a house.

data.name: Fossil Chair
data.flavorText: A chair carved from ancient bones. It is surprisingly sturdy for something so old.

data.name: Modified Organ
data.flavorText: An organ with a unique sound. It is steam powered and lets out plumes of smoke upon use.

data.name: Time-o-tron
data.flavorText: A cuckoo clock, without the cuckoo. It sends the alarm directly to its owner's brain, telepathically.

data.name: Cloud Throne
data.flavorText: It is miraculous that one can even sit on this throne, as the seat is made of clouds.

data.name: Timekeeper
data.flavorText: Honestly, it's just a clock. Or is it? Hmmm...

data.name: Rainbow Decal
data.flavorText: A rainbow that doesn't need any rain! Use it to spice up your living space.

data.name: Time Box
data.flavorText: This mysterious machine is constantly whirring and whizzing with no obvious effect.

data.name: Zapper Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp shaped like a lightning bolt, powered by Storm magic.

data.name: Pumpkin Dreams
data.flavorText: Pleasant dreams are had by all who sleep on this bed.

data.name: Melted Candles
data.flavorText: A great way to make your home feel extra comfy on cool autumn nights!

data.name: Creepy House Chair
data.flavorText: They say this chair is from a very old house filled with spooks!

data.name: Pumpkinfest Harvest Table
data.flavorText: The table of choice for those who like hosting Pumpkinfest activities in their own home.

data.name: Pianoy
data.flavorText: Pianoy the piano was made to look like it could come to life any minute!

data.name: Pumpcube
data.flavorText: They say these cubed pumpkins come from a far off land in the east!

data.name: Plumpkin Chair
data.flavorText: A plump chair in the shape of a pumpkin.

data.name: Pumpkinfest Side Table
data.flavorText: A traditional table displayed to commemorate the annual Pumpkinfest event.

data.name: Spooky Bedspread
data.flavorText: A bed for the bravest of wizards!

data.name: Spooky Side Table
data.flavorText: If you want to add a touch of spookiness to your home to celebrate Pumpkinfest, this side table will do the job.

data.name: Spidery Side Table
data.flavorText: The white pattern on this table was inspired by a spider's web.

data.name: Footstooly
data.flavorText: This fun stool looks like it could come to life at any moment! It would definitely make a great addition to anyone's playhouse!

data.name: Sweet Stash
data.flavorText: If you're a fan of sweet treats, this decoration is for you!

data.name: Milky Way Plush
data.flavorText: While you're counting down the days to the next Starlight Festival, this cute Milky Way the Space Cow plush can keep you company.

data.name: Starlight Side Table
data.flavorText: A great way to add a bit of Starlight Festival flair to any room.

data.name: Star Suite Bed
data.flavorText: A deluxe bed for super fans of Starlight Festival, they say those who fall asleep in it have dreams filled with shooting stars.

data.name: Starlight Rug
data.flavorText: Adds a splash of star to any room.

data.name: Star Seat
data.flavorText: A perfectly cushy place to sit down after an evening of hunting for shooting stars.

data.name: Star Jar
data.flavorText: A cute little night light. Great for any room.

data.name: Starlight Lamp
data.flavorText: A great lamp to light up your nights at home!

data.name: Standing Lantern
data.flavorText: A traditional lantern used in the old days of the Starlight Festival.

data.name: Star Topiary
data.flavorText: A fun little plant that grows in the shape of a star. It can only be found growing during the nights of the Starlight Festival.

data.name: Starlight Stool
data.flavorText: A casual seating option for Starlight Festival fans.

data.name: Night Bed
data.flavorText: A Starlight Festival-themed bed.

data.name: Moon Plushie
data.flavorText: This isn't made of cheese, so don't try to eat it.

data.name: Starlight Dining Table
data.flavorText: Want to have guests over to celebrate the Starlight Festival? This table's for you!

data.name: Cheery Chair
data.flavorText: Memories of Winterfest's past come flooding back for many who sit in this old  chair.

data.name: Evergreen Comfy Chair
data.flavorText: This chair is actually a magical tree that stays green all year round! Howard has decorated it with traditional Winterfest ornaments.

data.name: Decked Out Festive Bed
data.flavorText: For those who are really into the Winterfest spirit, this bed will keep you in the party mood from the moment you wake up, to the second you fall asleep!

data.name: Snowman Slumber Bed
data.flavorText: Cool blankets make sure you're at the perfect temperature to get a good night's sleep.

data.name: Classical Winterfest Bed
data.flavorText: This Winterfest bed has a much more classical and clean look to it, prominently featuring the famous Winterfest Wreath.

data.name: Seasonal Stocking
data.flavorText: This will really add some festive cheer to your walls. Try putting it next to a fireplace for a very seasonal look!

data.name: Red Display Gift
data.flavorText: You can't open this gift up, unfortunately, but display it in your living room to add some festival cheer!

data.name: Yellow Display Gift
data.flavorText: A very classy decoration for your home during the Winterfest celebration.

data.name: Evergreen Garland
data.flavorText: A nice touch to any home during the festival season. If you buy a bunch, you can line them up on your back wall to create one long chain!

data.name: Festival Tree
data.flavorText: The traditional evergreen tree of Winterfest is a great centerpiece for anyone's home during the holidays.

data.name: Jolly Fireplace
data.flavorText: This red fireplace will be sure to keep you warm through all the cold Winterfest months!

data.name: Festive Feast Table
data.flavorText: The perfect table for serving traditional rotisserie-style turkey on! If you have lots of guests over for the winter holidays, this is the table for you.

data.name: Festival Side Table
data.flavorText: The perfect addition to a Winterfest-themed living room!

data.name: Cozy Winterfest Rug
data.flavorText: A warm and cozy rug that feels great to walk on in your bare feet - even in the middle of winter!

data.name: Winterfest Den Lamp
data.flavorText: A lamp inspired by the traditional Winterfest tree. A very festive and classic look!

data.name: Cozy Couch
data.flavorText: The absolute perfect couch to curl up on during those cold Winterfest nights.

data.name: Evergreen Dining Chair
data.flavorText: If you're pining for a new dining room set, this chair's just for you! If you get a set of four of these, they will really spruce up your dining room!

data.name: Nest Chair
data.flavorText: After a long day of battling, cozy up in this chair and take it easy!

data.name: Gardening Shelf
data.flavorText: The tools are just for show, but they could show off someone with a real talent for gardening!

data.name: Bluebell Lamp
data.flavorText: These lamps add a really fun vibe to any room!

data.name: Flower Bed
data.flavorText: This isn"t just ANY flower bed! This bed"s MADE of FLOWERS!

data.name: Flowerbox Window
data.flavorText: Bring some fresh air into your home with this wonderful window!

data.name: Mushroom Side Table
data.flavorText: This table is said to be a favorite decoration among plumbers in a kingdom far away from here.

data.name: Chill & Char Guitar
data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.name: Chill & Char Ice & Fireplace
data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.flavorText: toyzone reward

data.name: Great Hall Lantern
data.flavorText: Utilizing the cleansed Titan Shard as a source for light, this was a traditional way for Titan Conquerors to light their fortresses, in the past. This is an animated house item!

data.name: Conqueror's Monument
data.flavorText: To represent the hard-fought battle of the Wizards against the Titan. This is an animated house item!

data.name: Conqueror's Throne
data.flavorText: A throne fit for a champion who has won many battles against the Titan. This is an animated house item!

data.name: Starter Home
data.flavorText: A true classic.

data.name: Ice Cave
data.flavorText: YOU'RE AS COLD AS ICE!

data.name: The Treehouse
data.flavorText: This would make for a cool clubhouse!

data.name: The Cool Cave
data.flavorText: You could really chill out in here.

data.name: The Fire Pit
data.flavorText: I bet you'd feel warm in here even in the middle of Winterfest!

data.name: Cozy Cottage
data.flavorText: This place feels cozy.

data.name: Tiny T
data.flavorText: This place feels cozy.

data.name: Open Space
data.flavorText: This house is not too big, or too small. It's just right!

data.name: Split Space
data.flavorText: This house is not too big, or too small. It's just right!

data.name: Roomy Rooms
data.flavorText: You won't run out of room in here any time soon!

data.name: The Mansion
data.flavorText: You won't run out of room in here any time soon!

data.name: Bonfire Den
data.flavorText: The large space on the right side of the house can be used for a lot of different things!

data.name: Split Decision
data.flavorText: If you like a big room on the left AND right side of your house, this place is perfect!

data.name: Modern Design
data.flavorText: A long hallway opens to a large room. There are a ton of neat ways you could decorate this kind of home!

data.name: Branching Ice Cave
data.flavorText: Three large spaces give owners lots of rooms to create their own layouts!

data.name: Tree Fort
data.flavorText: The two central log pillars add a lot of unique style to this tree house.

data.name: Treetop Terrace
data.flavorText: Super spacious space for studying wizards!

data.flavorText: Buying this will change your eye color!

data.name: Brown Hamster
data.flavorText:
A friendly hamster whose best qualities include being pocket-sized, puffy, and being able to stuff lots of food in his cheeks. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: White Cat
data.flavorText:
This little kitty will follow you anywhere you go, especially if you have some string! Soft and fluffy, the perfect combination of cute! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Tuxedo Cat
data.flavorText:
This little kitty will follow you anywhere you go, especially if you have some string! Soft and fluffy, the perfect combination of cute! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Shepherd
data.flavorText:
Adorable, loving, loyal and even housebroken! Man's best friend indeed! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

Adorable, loving, loyal and even housebroken! Man's best friend indeed! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

Adorable, loving, loyal and even housebroken! Man's best friend indeed! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Spotted Hamster
data.flavorText:
A friendly hamster whose best qualities include being pocket-sized, puffy, and being able to stuff lots of food in his cheeks. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Barn Owl
data.flavorText:
During the night, this owl is alert and on the prowl. In the day, however, it's super sleepy. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Blue Parrot
data.flavorText:
This parrot can mimic your voice, but it only really uses certain words...Polly want a cracker? 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Cockatiel
data.flavorText:
A very smart bird, cockatiels are known to be able to count and even use math! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Grey Parrot
data.flavorText:
This parrot can mimic your voice, but it only really uses certain words...Polly want a cracker? 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

During the night, this owl is alert and on the prowl. In the day, however, it's super sleepy. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Red Parrot
data.flavorText:
This parrot can mimic your voice, but it only really uses certain words...Polly want a cracker? 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Chameleon
data.flavorText:
This little lizard can change its colors to blend in with its surroundings, but sometimes just chooses not to. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Gecko
data.flavorText:
A gecko can climb almost any surface and even upside down! This gecko seems to be afraid of heights, though. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Leopard Gecko
data.flavorText:
A gecko can climb almost any surface and even upside down! This gecko seems to be afraid of heights, though. 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Turtle
data.flavorText:
Turtles are normally pretty slow, but this one has no issue keeping up with you! 

Can be bought at the Pet Shop in Lamplight Town.

data.name: Baby Reindeer
data.flavorText: These happy little creatures couldn't possibly be more excited to join you on your quest! They are well known for being great pals on adventures. Sold during Winterfest.

data.name: Penguin
data.flavorText:
What's black and white and chilly all over? Why a penguin of course! This polar pal is ready to explore beyond the cold lands it calls home with you! 

Sold during Winterfest.

data.name: Baby Snowman
data.flavorText:
With just a little bit of magic, this snowman came to life, and now, he's looking for a buddy to explore with! Don't worry, he can't melt! 

Sold during Winterfest.

data.name: Saber-Tooth Cat
data.flavorText: This furry friend loves to frolic in the snow and play hide and seek in the caverns deep within Shiverchill Mountains.

data.name: Purple Owl
data.flavorText: Shiverchill is home to many interesting creatures. The rare Purple Owl is one of them! Some say that these owls have magical powers.

data.name: Steam-Powered Robot Bird 9001
data.flavorText: Steam-powered robot birds were created to help workers in Skywatch repair the weather machines.

data.name: Flower Turtle
data.flavorText: Some turtles that live in Firefly Forest fall asleep in soil for long periods of time. When this happens, flowers begin to grow on their shell!

data.name: Rainbow Panda
data.flavorText: The rainbow panda is so hard to find in the forest, because it can blend in so well with its environment.

data.name: Cloud Sheep
data.flavorText: These sheep like to get around by riding on gusts of wind that sweep them up. If you ever see a group of them gathered together, watch out! Their fur can rub together and create lightning storms!

data.name: Cuddly Cactus
data.flavorText: This cactus is surprisingly cuddly! The needles on it fall off at a very young age, leaving its soft skin free to cuddle!

data.name: Flame Salamander
data.flavorText: These little fiery friends scamper, scurry, and swim through the lava of Bonfire Spire. Because of this, very few people have ever seen one!

data.name: Fox
data.flavorText:
A sly fox would usually keep their distance, but this one is happy to follow you anywhere! 

Reward for linking your account with your parent's account.

data.name: Sparkle Hamster
data.flavorText: A sparkly, pocket-sized friend who loves to stuff lots of food in its cheeks! Can be won from the Twilight Wheel.

data.name: Sparkle Kitty
data.flavorText: A sparkly kitty whose glittering fur will be the talk of the town! Can be won from the Twilight Wheel.

data.name: Sparkle Puppy
data.flavorText: This sparkly best friend is loyal to the end and is happy to follow you anywhere! Can be won from the Twilight Wheel.

data.name: Big Hex
data.flavorText: He comes from an unknown place with an unknown name. You've decided to call him Big Hex for the large bolts that seem to hold him together.

data.name: Florafox
data.flavorText: Florafox can speak with nearby plants and trees by planting itself in the soil. The bulb on Florafox's tail produces a pollen that can heal any plant, no matter how injured or withered.

data.name: Arctursus
data.flavorText: The air around Arctursus is always cold. This is because the tips of his fur are made from an ice that can never melt, and so no matter where he goes he is always at a comfortable temperature.

data.name: Diveodile
data.flavorText: Diveodile's natural magic ability is boosted by the Warden pendant it wears, allowing it to cast strong water spells to generate water, or even control the water around itself!

data.name: Magmischief
data.flavorText: While traveling underground, Magmischief can sense movement on the surface, so he knows exactly where to appear and get the biggest scare out of those who have entered Bonfire Spire.

data.name: Crab
data.flavorText: What a cute little crab! He blows bubbles too! Pinch pinch pop!

data.name: Baby Squid
data.flavorText: What's more adorable than a baby squid that squirts ink? Not much!

data.name: Puffer Fish
data.flavorText: This floaty fish is fun to have bob along behind you.

data.name: Cat Fish
data.flavorText: It's a cat AND a fish! What's not to love?!

data.name: Chill & Char
data.flavorText: Chill & Char are best friends, not just because they share a body, but because their abilities complement each other so well.

data.name: Tidus
data.flavorText: Tidus can create massive waves with a flap of his powerful wings below water. Tidus has also been known to do it just to ride the waves.

data.name: Luma
data.flavorText: On sunny days, Luma loves to romp through flower filled fields, soaking up the sun rays.

data.name: Eclipse
data.flavorText: Eclipse soars and swoops through the clouds in the night sky, playing hide and go seek with the moon and stars.

data.name: Hot Shot Monsta
data.flavorText: These guys love to play in lava and pop the lava bubbles.

data.name: Pyro Peck
data.flavorText: Who needs a campfire when you have your own Pyro Peck to keep you warm and cozy!

data.name: Terrosaur Bone
data.flavorText: This bone looks like a piece from a much larger skeleton. I better find them all!

data.name: Stampeed Bone
data.flavorText: This bone looks like a piece from a much larger skeleton. I better find them all!

data.name: Claustro Bone
data.flavorText: This bone looks like a piece from a much larger skeleton. I better find them all!

data.name: Pterrocks Bone
data.flavorText: This bone looks like a piece from a much larger skeleton. I better find them all!

data.name: Beetle in Amber
data.flavorText: It appears to be a large beetle, preserved in a piece of amber. Neat!

data.name: Trellobyte
data.flavorText: Trellobytes once scavenged the ocean floors, looking for scraps and collectible cards.

data.name: Sharp Claw
data.flavorText: A large claw to some carnivore...or perhaps an ill-tempered herbivore.

data.name: Dragonfly in Amber
data.flavorText: This dragonfly must have landed on a tree, and got caught in some tree sap.

data.name: Shell
data.flavorText: This shell was likely once home to a large crustacean, or perhaps just a fancy-looking thermos.

data.name: Mosquito in Amber
data.flavorText: These are often treasured as jewelry, and some old men like to place them atop their canes.

data.name: Piece of Fossilized Fish
data.flavorText: A fragment of a fossilized fish...it looks like there are more out there!

data.name: Piece of Fossilized Plant
data.flavorText: A fragment of a fossilized plant...it looks like there are more out there!

data.name: Terrosaur Skeleton
data.flavorText: A skeleton of the awesome terrosaur, the meanest dyno in history!

data.name: Stampeed Skeleton
data.flavorText: A skeleton of a Stampeed. It looks pretty cool, and boy is it heavy!

data.name: Claustro Skeleton
data.flavorText: This skeleton of a claustro is actually a combination of bone and cartilage.

data.name: Pterrocks Skeleton
data.flavorText: This pterrocks skeleton is incredibly fragile, and is held together with strong glue and wire.

data.name: Beetle in Amber
data.flavorText: It appears to be a large beetle, preserved in a piece of amber. Neat!

data.flavorText: This shell was likely once a home to a large crustacean, or perhaps just a fancy-looking thermos.

data.name: Mosquito in Amber
data.flavorText: These are often treasured as jewellry, and some old men like to place them atop their canes.

data.name: Fossilized Fish
data.flavorText: This fish was likely a deep ocean dweller; perhaps a Darkfish, Crazyfish, or maybe the rare Stinkyfish.

data.name: Fossilized Plant
data.flavorText: A small fern, fossilized over millions of years. This plant still exists on the island today.

data.name: Boy
data.flavorText: Buying this will change your gender!

data.name: The Row-Row
data.flavorText: The Row-Row is maximum air flow on your head, yo!

data.name: The Pegasus
data.flavorText: Like a horse tail with two wings, you may feel lighter when the wind blows strong.

data.name: The Wild Side
data.flavorText: Shaved and long as you twist and shout.

data.name: The Double Cross
data.flavorText: 1 style = 2 x sassiness.

data.name: The Frizz-Fro
data.flavorText: The Frizz-Fro keeps you cool when things get hot.

data.name: The Warrior
data.flavorText: Channel your fighting spirit. The Warrior is the strongest bun!

data.name: The 2-Tailed Pony
data.flavorText: Twin pony tails are perky and playful.

data.name: The Star Buns
data.flavorText: Star Princess or Tasty Pastry? You decide how this style--rolls.
